column4: I"m having trouble with Ubuntu Cloud. I've got the software and setup running, but when I search for images in the store it waits for some time before giving me an error (7) Could not connect to host.
are you connected to the Internet?
well to be more precise, Yes I am, I"m having second thoughts about the server now ... Let me check that
Yes, I've confirmed that the server has a proper connection to the internet.
